title: Update problem
body:
Hi, so i downloaded the patch 6.12 and it's now stuck at 33%. It says it's currently scanning files and has just reached over 50k.
It's been a couple of hours now and people keep telling me to be patient but this is ridiculous.
Can someone tell me what to do?

replies.body:
If you're still encountering patching issues, give the solutions in this thread a shot:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/PuEpZLzo-having-patching-issues-try-these-solutions

Let me know if that fixes it!
Thank you so much, it works fine now.

> [{quoted}](name=KingRelentless,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=o34t6kU9,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-04T05:03:36.086+0000)
>
> Thank you so much, it works fine now.

Awesome! See ya on the Rift!

Hey there,

Is this issue still ongoing?
hi, umm all g now, thanks for helping out.
